attributes.action: Make My Birthday A National Holiday in the UK (SnoozyBoozy)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My Birthday, 22nd November, should be UK National Holiday on grounds of alcohol intake requirements for myself, my husband and all my friends, and all their friends, and my neighbours, and all my friends neighbours, and all their friends neighbours.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
